00040 void glcd_init_hw(void)
00041 {
00042         // initialize I/O ports
00043         // if I/O interface is in use
00044 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00045 
00046         // initialize LCD control lines levels
00047         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00048         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00049         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00050         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS0);
00051         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS1);
00052         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS2);
00053         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS3);
00054         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RESET);
00055         // initialize LCD control port to output
00056         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00057         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00058         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00059         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_CS0);
00060         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_CS1);
00061         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_CS2);
00062         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_CS3);
00063         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_DDR, GLCD_CTRL_RESET);
00064         // initialize LCD data
00065         outb(GLCD_DATA_PORT,0x00);
00066         // initialize LCD data port to output
00067         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0xFF;
00068 #endif
00069 }
00070 
00071 void glcd_controller_select(u08 controller)
00072 {
00073 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00074         // unselect all controllers
00075         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS0);
00076         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS1);
00077         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS2);
00078         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS3);
00079 
00080         // select requested controller
00081         switch(controller)
00082         {
00083         case 0: sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS0); break;
00084         case 1: sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS1); break;
00085         case 2: sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS2); break;
00086         case 3: sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_CS3); break;
00087         default: break;
00088         }
00089 #endif
00090 }
00091 
00092 void glcd_busy_wait(u08 controller)
00093 {
00094 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00095 //      ENTER_CRIT;
00096         // wait until LCD busy bit goes to zero
00097         // select the controller chip
00098         glcd_controller_select(controller);
00099         // do a read from control register
00100         outb(GLCD_DATA_PORT,0xFF);
00101         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00102         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0x00;
00103         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00104         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00105         __asm__ __volatile__("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__("nop");
00106         while(inb(GLCD_DATA_PIN) & GLCD_STATUS_BUSY)
00107         {
00108                 cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00109                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00110                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00111                 sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00112                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00113                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00114         }
00115         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00116         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00117         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0xFF;
00118 //      EXIT_CRIT;
00119 #else
00120         // sbi(MCUCR, SRW);                     // enable RAM waitstate
00121         // wait until LCD busy bit goes to zero
00122         while(*(volatile unsigned char *)
00123                 (GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR + GLCD_CONTROLLER_ADDR_OFFSET*controller) & GLCD_STATUS_BUSY);
00124         // cbi(MCUCR, SRW);                     // disable RAM waitstate
00125 #endif
00126 }
00127 
00128 void glcd_control_write(u08 controller, u08 data)
00129 {
00130 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00131         glcd_busy_wait(controller);     // wait until LCD not busy
00132         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00133         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00134         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00135         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0xFF;
00136         outb(GLCD_DATA_PORT,data);
00137         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00138         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00139         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00140         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00141         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00142 #else
00143         //sbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // enable RAM waitstate
00144         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00145         *(volatile unsigned char *) (GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR + GLCD_CONTROLLER_ADDR_OFFSET*controller) = data;
00146         //cbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // disable RAM waitstate
00147 #endif
00148 }
00149 
00150 u08 glcd_control_read(u08 controller)
00151 {
00152         register u08 data;
00153 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00154         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00155         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00156         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0x00;
00157         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00158         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00159         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00160         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00161         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00162         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00163         data = inb(GLCD_DATA_PIN);
00164         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00165         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00166         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0xFF;
00167 #else
00168         //sbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // enable RAM waitstate
00169         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00170         data = *(volatile unsigned char *) (GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR + GLCD_CONTROLLER_ADDR_OFFSET*controller);
00171         //cbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // disable RAM waitstate
00172 #endif
00173         return data;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void glcd_data_write(u08 data)
00177 {
00178         register u08 controller = (GrLcdState.lcdXAddr/GLCD_CONTROLLER_XPIXELS);
00179 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00180         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00181         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00182         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00183         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00184         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0xFF;
00185         outb(GLCD_DATA_PORT,data);
00186         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00187         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00188         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00189         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00190         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00191 #else
00192         //sbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // enable RAM waitstate
00193         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00194         *(volatile unsigned char *) (GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR + GLCD_CONTROLLER_ADDR_OFFSET*controller) = data;
00195         //cbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // disable RAM waitstate
00196 #endif
00197         // increment our local address counter
00198         GrLcdState.ctrlr[controller].xAddr++;
00199         GrLcdState.lcdXAddr++;
00200         if(GrLcdState.lcdXAddr >= GLCD_XPIXELS)
00201         {
00202                 GrLcdState.lcdYAddr++;
00203                 glcd_set_y_address(GrLcdState.lcdYAddr);
00204                 glcd_set_x_address(0);
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 u08 glcd_data_read(void)
00209 {
00210         register u08 data;
00211         register u08 controller = (GrLcdState.lcdXAddr/GLCD_CONTROLLER_XPIXELS);
00212 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00213         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00214         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RS);
00215         GLCD_DATA_DDR = 0x00;
00216         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00217         sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00218         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00219         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00220         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00221         __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop"); __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00222         data = inb(GLCD_DATA_PIN);
00223         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_E);
00224         cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RW);
00225 #else
00226         //sbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // enable RAM waitstate
00227         glcd_busy_wait(controller);             // wait until LCD not busy
00228         data = *(volatile unsigned char *) (GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR + GLCD_CONTROLLER_ADDR_OFFSET*controller);
00229         //cbi(MCUCR, SRW);                              // disable RAM waitstate
00230 #endif
00231         // increment our local address counter
00232         GrLcdState.ctrlr[controller].xAddr++;
00233         GrLcdState.lcdXAddr++;
00234         if(GrLcdState.lcdXAddr >= GLCD_XPIXELS)
00235         {
00236                 GrLcdState.lcdYAddr++;
00237                 glcd_set_y_address(GrLcdState.lcdYAddr);
00238                 glcd_set_x_address(0);
00239         }
00240         return data;
00241 }
00242 
00243 void glcd_reset(u08 reset_state)
00244 {
00245         // reset lcd if argument is true
00246         // run lcd if argument is false
00247 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00248         if(reset_state)
00249                 cbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RESET);
00250         else
00251                 sbi(GLCD_CTRL_PORT, GLCD_CTRL_RESET);
00252 #endif
00253 }
00254 
00255 u08 glcd_get_x_address()
00256 {
00257         return (GrLcdState.lcdXAddr);
00258 }
00259 
00260 u08 glcd_get_y_address()
00261 {
00262         return (GrLcdState.lcdYAddr);
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00266 void glcd_set_x_address(u08 xAddr)
00267 {
00268         u08 i;
00269         // record address change locally
00270         GrLcdState.lcdXAddr = xAddr;
00271         
00272         // clear y (col) address on all controllers
00273         for(i=0; i<GLCD_NUM_CONTROLLERS; i++)
00274         {
00275                 glcd_control_write(i, GLCD_SET_Y_ADDR | 0x00);
00276                 GrLcdState.ctrlr[i].xAddr = 0;
00277         }
00278 
00279         // set y (col) address on destination controller
00280         glcd_control_write((GrLcdState.lcdXAddr/GLCD_CONTROLLER_XPIXELS),
00281                 GLCD_SET_Y_ADDR | (GrLcdState.lcdXAddr & 0x3F));
00282 }
00283 
00284 void glcd_set_y_address(u08 yAddr)
00285 {
00286         u08 i;
00287         // record address change locally
00288         GrLcdState.lcdYAddr = yAddr;
00289         // set page address for all controllers
00290         for(i=0; i<GLCD_NUM_CONTROLLERS; i++)
00291         {
00292                 glcd_control_write(i, GLCD_SET_PAGE | yAddr);
00293         }
00294 }

00297 /*************************************************************/
00298 /********************* PUBLIC FUNCTIONS **********************/
00299 /*************************************************************/
00300 
00301 void glcd_init()
00302 {
00303         u08 i;
00304         
00305         // initialize hardware
00306         glcd_init_hw();
00307         // bring lcd out of reset
00308         glcd_reset(FALSE);
00309         // Turn on LCD
00310         for(i=0; i<GLCD_NUM_CONTROLLERS; i++)
00311         {
00312                 glcd_control_write(i, GLCD_ON_CTRL | GLCD_ON_DISPLAY);
00313         }
00314         // clear lcd
00315         glcd_clear_screen();
00316         // initialize positions
00317         glcd_home();
00318 }
00319 
00320 void glcd_home(void)
00321 {
00322         u08 i;
00323         // initialize addresses/positions
00324         glcd_start_line(0);
00325         glcd_set_address(0,0);
00326         // initialize local data structures
00327         for(i=0; i<GLCD_NUM_CONTROLLERS; i++)
00328         {
00329                 GrLcdState.ctrlr[i].xAddr = 0;
00330                 GrLcdState.ctrlr[i].yAddr = 0;
00331         }
00332 }
00333 
00334 void glcd_clear_screen(void)
00335 {
00336         glcd_clear();
00337 }
00338 
00339 void glcd_start_line(u08 start)
00340 {
00341         glcd_control_write(0, GLCD_START_LINE | start);
00342         glcd_control_write(1, GLCD_START_LINE | start);
00343 }
00344 
00345 void glcd_set_address(u08 x, u08 yLine)
00346 {
00347         // set addresses
00348         glcd_set_y_address(yLine);
00349         glcd_set_x_address(x);
00350 }
00351 
00352 void glcd_goto_char(u08 line, u08 col)
00353 {
00354         glcd_set_address(col*6, line);
00355 }

00357 void glcd_delay(u16 p)                  // 1-8us      ...2-13us     ...5-31us
00358 {                                                               // 10-60us    ...50-290us
00359         unsigned int i;                         // 100-580us  ...500-2,9ms
00360         unsigned char j;                        // 1000-5,8ms ...5000-29ms
00361                                                                 // 10000-56ms ...30000-170ms
00362                                                                 // 50000-295ms...60000-345ms
00363         //for (i = 0; i < p; i++) for (j = 0; j < 10; j++) __asm__ __volatile__ ("nop");
00364         for (i = 0; i < p; i++) for (j = 0; j < 10; j++);
00365 }
